a.style: font-family:"Playfair Display", Georgia, "Times New Roman", serif

text.tspan: How much global land is used for growing crops?
Cropland is land used to grow crops, excluding pasture used for livestock grazing. This is shown for three sources,
which use different methods of estimation.
Source: Taylor & Rising (2021); Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations; Ellis et al. (2020)
